summary.para: Identifies the type of size value to retrieve for a visual style part.

remarks.para: A value from the THEMESIZE enumeration is used with the function to specify the type of size value to retrieve for a particular visual style part.

summary.para: Receives the minimum size of a visual style part.
Receives the size of the visual style part that will best fit the available space.
Receives the size that the theme manager uses to draw a part.
